programme.title: Rounders (1998)
programme.desc: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school

programme.title: The Mighty Ducks (1992)
programme.desc: Emilio Estevez coaches a lousy youth hockey team to the finals of a non-relevent hockey league. His old coach stands in his way.

programme.title: Days of Thunder (1990)
programme.desc: A man and his dream to race a car around a circle... 5 HUNDRED TIMES!

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: Jets in the sky... pewww peewwwww

programme.title: Three Kings (1999)
programme.desc: Planes in the sky... pewww peewwwww

programme.title: The Little Hours (2017)
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation

programme.title: The Spectacular Now (2013)
programme.desc: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical "nice girl."

programme.title: The Drop (2014)
programme.desc: Bob Saginowski finds himself at the center of a robbery gone awry and entwined in an investigation that digs deep into the neighborhood's past where friends, families, and foes all work together to make a living - no matter the cost

programme.title: The Little Hours (2017)
programme.desc: In the Middle Ages, a young servant fleeing from his master takes refuge at a convent full of emotionally unstable nuns. Introduced as a deaf mute man, he must fight to hold his cover as the nuns try to resist temptation

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk (2008)
programme.desc: Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government, must find a cure for the monster he turns into whenever he loses his temper

programme.title: The Ides of March (2011)
programme.desc: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail

programme.title: The Disaster Artist (2017)
programme.desc: When Greg Sestero, an aspiring film actor, meets the weird and mysterious Tommy Wiseau in an acting class, they form a unique friendship and travel to Hollywood to make their dreams come true

programme.title: Honey Boy (2019)
programme.desc: A young actor's stormy childhood and early adult years as he struggles to reconcile with his father and deal with his mental health

programme.title: Gravity (2013)
programme.desc: 99.9% she wouldn't make it in real life

programme.title: Passengers (2016)
programme.desc: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early

programme.title: First Man (2018)
programme.desc: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969

programme.title: Moon (2009)
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems

programme.title: Arrival (2016)
programme.desc: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world

programme.title: Gravity (2013)
programme.desc: 99.9% she wouldn't make it in real life

programme.title: Passengers (2016)
programme.desc: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early

programme.title: First Man (2018)
programme.desc: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969

programme.title: As Above, So Below (2014)
programme.desc: When a team of explorers ventures into the catacombs that lie beneath the streets of Paris, they uncover the dark secret that lies within this city of the dead

programme.title: Annabelle (2014)
programme.desc: A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation (2017)
programme.desc: Twelve years after the tragic death of their little girl, a doll-maker and his wife welcome a nun and several girls from a shuttered orphanage into their home, where they become the target of the doll-maker's possessed creation, Annabelle

programme.title: Annabelle Comes Home (2019)
programme.desc: While babysitting the daughter of Ed and Lorraine Warren, a teenager and her friend unknowingly awaken an evil spirit trapped in a doll

programme.title: Lawrence of Arabia (1962)
programme.desc: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks

programme.title: The Brothers Grimsby (2016)
programme.desc: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother

programme.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015)
programme.desc: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons

programme.title: Wonder Woman (2017)
programme.desc: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny

programme.title: UFC 252: Miocic vs Cormier 3
programme.desc: UFC 252: Miocic vs. Cormier 3 is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that will take place on August 15, 2020 at the UFC APEX facility in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States

programme.title: UFC 252: Miocic vs Cormier 3
programme.desc: UFC 252: Miocic vs. Cormier 3 is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that will take place on August 15, 2020 at the UFC APEX facility in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give (2003)
programme.desc: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age

programme.title: Once (2007)
programme.desc: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story

programme.title: Brigadoon (1954)
programme.desc: Two Americans on a hunting trip in Scotland become lost. They encounter a small village, not on the map, called Brigadoon, in which people harbor a mysterious secret, and behave as if they were still living two hundred years in the past

programme.title: On Chesil Beach (2017)
programme.desc: Based on Ian McEwan's novel. In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night

programme.title: Mid90s (2018)
programme.desc: Follows Stevie, a thirteen-year-old in 1990s-era Los Angeles who spends his summer navigating between his troubled home life and a group of new friends that he meets at a Motor Avenue skate shop

programme.title: Wildlife (2018)
programme.desc: A teenage boy must deal with his mother's complicated response after his father temporarily abandons them to take a menial and dangerous job

programme.desc: Based on Ian McEwan's novel. In 1962 England, a young couple find their idyllic romance colliding with issues of sexual freedom and societal pressure, leading to an awkward and fateful wedding night

programme.title: Enter the Dragon (1973)
programme.desc: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover

programme.title: Irresistible (2020)
programme.desc: A Democratic strategist helps a retired veteran run for mayor in a small, conservative Midwest town

programme.title: True History of the Kelly Gang (2019)
programme.desc: Based on Peter Carey's novel. The story of Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang as they flee from authorities during the 1870s

programme.title: Snatchers (2019)
programme.desc: After status-obsessed teen Sara has sex for the first time, she wakes up the next day nine months pregnant-with an alien

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens (2015)
programme.desc: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi (2017)
programme.desc: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order

programme.title: Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker (2019)
programme.desc: The surviving members of the resistance face the First Order once again, and the legendary conflict between the Jedi and the Sith reaches its peak bringing the Skywalker saga to its end
